text: Colors Bangla Cinema (Bengali: কালার্স বাংলা সিনেমা) is an Indian pay television movie channel broadcasting in Bengali language owned by Viacom 18. == References == Category:Bengali-language television channels in India Category:Television stations in Kolkata Category:Movie channels in India Category:Viacom 18 Category:Television channels and stations established in 2019
title: Colors Bangla Cinema
